title: Refund Policy
content: Customers are eligible for a full refund within 30 days of purchase if the product is unused and in original packaging.

title: Data Privacy Policy
content: We do not share customer data with third parties without explicit consent. All data is stored securely in compliance with GDPR.

question: How can I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' at the login page and follow the instructions sent to your email.
